about_the_game: The “Start Kit” includes the fast start. What does it mean? You will receive 10 thousand of clips, all month premiums and additional bonus of 5 unique masks. Individuality and simplicity are the things provided by the welcome kit.
detailed_description: The “Start Kit” includes the fast start. What does it mean? You will receive 10 thousand of clips, all month premiums and additional bonus of 5 unique masks. Individuality and simplicity are the things provided by the welcome kit.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+ / SteamOS+
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo Processor or Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+ / SteamOS+
  • Processor: Core i5 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo Processor or Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Core i5 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000

name: Batla - Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo Processor or Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB DX9 Compliant
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Core i5 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB DX9 Compliant
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio

short_description: The “Start Kit” includes the fast start. What does it mean? You will receive 10 thousand of clips, all month premiums and additional bonus of 5 unique masks. Individuality and simplicity are the things provided by the welcome kit.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
